body_html:
I don't want to spam here... but my company, Translated.net, has been a Google provider for human translation services for the last 10 years. We are now testing Tensorflow to speed ups the translator work thought better AI suggestions.
So if you need help we can manage the crowd translation contributions and integrate with pro translators when needed.

In case, just ping me at first name at translated.net
